title: Strawberries without cream

description: Strawberry plants are subject to virus degeneration diseases which formerly restricted the industry in Victoria. Resistant strains are now bred in an isolated area and supplied to growers, all plantings being replaced every three years, and the problem is controlled. The film shows how the scheme operates.
